title: Playing for Keeps
description: He remembers everything... except the first thirty years of his life.Sports star-turned-coach Lucas Delaunay has no recollection of his past, despite his parents' and friends' efforts to help him.Enter Isabelle Ferrand, a young publicist hired to land sponsors and fundraise for Lucas's club. He is told she was a friend. Just a friend. Everyone, Isabelle included, insists he regarded her as a sister.Not anymore, he doesn't.Every night, he dreams of her naked and panting beneath him. Her taste, her smell, the way her breasts fill his palms... Every morning he wakes up rock hard, groping for her in his empty bed.With desire spinning out of control, Lucas wonders if amnesia has changed his taste in women, or if there's something Isabelle isn't telling him.And if she might be the key to unlocking his past.
author: Alix Nichols
